title: Best Quotes of the Week: Frys.com Open
headline: Best Quotes of the Week: Frys.com Open
description: Tiger Woods on how he met Notah Begay, Jarrod Lyle on what helps him balance his emotions and Rashean Mathis on steering his son away from the gridiron and onto the golf course headline this edition of the Best Quotes of the Week.
